articles.description: Mercedes-Benz says it plans to recall 1.29 million vehicles starting April 6. The automaker identified a glitch in the eCall system that shares a vehicle's location in the event of an accident.
articles.content:
Mercedes-Benz announced it will recall 1.29 million vehicles in the US sold since 2016 due to faulty software that may fail to communicate correct vehicle location in the event of a crash.
The recal… [+2898 chars]
